description.value: Unfurling your wings in a quick snap, you send feathers scattering in all directions. Creatures in a @Template[emanation|distance:15] take @Damage[6d6[slashing]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[reflex|against:class|basic] save against your class DC). This increases to @Damage[10d6[slashing]|options:area-damage] if your unarmed attacks have a greater striking rune, such as by etching it onto @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Handwraps of Mighty Blows], and @Damage[16d6[slashing]|options:area-damage] if they have a major striking rune.
